comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: Major General Henry Ware Lawton was buried on February 9, 1900. His gravesite is at Section East Site 841 EH. ref. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9902EEDB153DE433A... www.arlingtoncemetery.net/hwlawton.htm

comment.author: 33632796@N00
comment._content: The current memorial for his is not in this picture.  It is an intriguing work in the Arts Nouveau style, a bronze traditional Filipino house held up by Filipino boys.
